Rulings.Tengu:
●“Gift of the Martyr” increases the monster’s ATK by the original ATK of the monster sent to the GY.
●Sending a monster to the GY is a cost for “Gift of the Martyr”. This is an effect that targets.
●You can send a face-down monster to the GY as the cost of “Gift of the Martyr”. Refer to the original ATK of the monster.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Gift of the Martyr" increases the monster's ATK by the original ATK of the monster sent to the GY.\n2. Sending a monster to the GY is a cost for "Gift of the Martyr". This is an effect that targets.\n3. You can send a face-down monster to the GY as the cost of "Gift of the Martyr". Refer to the original ATK of the monster.
